## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Functions are small and focused (max 50 lines)
- [ ] Error handling is explicit â€” no silenced errors
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets, paths, or magic numbers
- [ ] No TODO/FIXME left in production code

### Testing

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated for new logic
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated where applicable
- [ ] Edge cases and error paths are tested
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] Coverage meets project threshold

### Review Readiness

- [ ] Self-reviewed the diff before requesting review
- [ ] Documentation updated (if public API changed)
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] PR is scoped to a single concern
